sentences.en: A Limiting factor is one which stands in the way of accomplishment of a desired objective.
sentences.cn: 限制因素是达成期望目标的障碍.

sentences.en: For a novelist, that's quite an accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 对于一位小说家来说，那是相当了不起的成就。

sentences.en: He found every road to the accomplishment of his desire shut against him.
sentences.cn: 他发现通向实现自己愿望的所有道路都被堵死了.

sentences.en: Her technical accomplishment on the piano is startling.
sentences.cn: 她在钢琴方面的造诣令人惊歎.

sentences.en: I advise you to learn, for German is a valuable accomplishment to teachers.
sentences.cn: 我劝你继续学下去, 因为对教师来说,德语是一门很重要的学问.

sentences.en: I defy you to come up with one major accomplishment of the current Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 我敢说你讲不出现任首相的哪怕一项重大成就。

sentences.en: Investors value that accomplishment at $ 168 billion ( the company's market capitalization ).
sentences.cn: 投资商们估计该公司的销售业绩已经达到了1680亿美元 ( 市场资本 ).

sentences.en: It was a major accomplishment for a player who had been injured so recently.
sentences.cn: 对于一个刚受过伤的选手来说，这是很好的成绩。

sentences.en: Mcpherson had made his mark with sparkling accomplishment in that most difficult areas.
sentences.cn: 麦克弗森在这个最困难的领域里取得了辉煌战果,而声名大噪.

sentences.en: Money will be crucial to the accomplishment of our objectives.
sentences.cn: 要实现我们的目标,钱是至关重要的.

sentences.en: Regarding raises this aspect the accomplishment is very important.
sentences.cn: 对于培养这方面的素养是很重要的.

sentences.en: Still, to have captured such vibrancy in another language is a major accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说, 能够在另一种语言里表现出这种生动的节奏就是一大成功.

sentences.en: The accomplishment of these multiple purposes usually requires the concomitant use of two or three drugs.
sentences.cn: 为了使这些目的都能达到,通常需要同时应用2～3种药物.

sentences.en: The mathematicians were almost smug about this accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 数学家们几乎都为这一成就自鸣得意.

sentences.en: The series of paintings is quite an accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 这一系列的绘画真是了不起的成就.

sentences.en: We adore him for his integrity and brilliant diplomatic accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 我们因他的正直和辉煌的外交成就而敬重他.

words.tran_cn: 完成的；熟练的，有技巧的；有修养的；有学问的

trans.tran_cn: 成就，成绩，才艺，完成，实现
trans.tran_en: something successful or impressive that is achieved after a lot of effort and hard work
